EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Powering Enterprise Transformation with Cloud and Data Seminar_KY_
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Seminar: Strategies for Digital Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Seminar coming up tomorrow in Louisville, Kentucky. We look forward to seeing you!
Pivotal Seminar Strategies for Digital Transformation Thursday, May 21st, 2015 8:30am - 3:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Registration & Breakfast opens at 8:30 a.m. Workshop Agenda
Louisville Marriott Downtown 280 W. Jefferson Street Louisville, KY Map & Directions
Parking Information This hotel offers on-site parking for a fee of $27 daily.
QUESTIONS? Contact Rae Sinanan-Hill by email or via cell at (202) 415-1908 <ph:(202) 415-1908>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/strategies-for-digital-transformation/louisville>
